---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(ggfortify)
library(broom)
library(modelr)
```

```{r}
project <-read_csv("data/project_management.csv")
```

```{r}
project
```

```{r}
model <- lm(estimated_length ~ actual_length, data = project)

model %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = actual_length, y = estimated_length)) +
  geom_point()
  
```
```{r}
plot(model)
```

```{r}
project <- project %>%
  add_predictions(model) 

project %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = actual_length)) +
  geom_point(aes(y = estimated_length)) +
  geom_line(aes(y = pred), col = "red")
```

```{r}
project2 <- project[-c(5),]
  
model2 <- lm(estimated_length ~ actual_length, data = project2)
```

```{r}
project2 <- project2 %>%
  add_predictions(model2) 

project2 %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = actual_length)) +
  geom_point(aes(y = estimated_length)) +
  geom_line(aes(y = pred), col = "blue")
```

```{r}
plot(model2)
```
